body.p: For many calculations you use a calculator. The main aim of this unit is to help you to do this in a sensible and fruitful way. Using a calculation to solve a problem involves four main stages:

li.p: Stage 1: working out what calculation you want to do;
Stage 2: working out roughly what size of answer to expect from your calculation;
Stage 4: interpreting the answer â€“ Does it agree with the rough estimate? Does it make sense in terms of the original problem?

body.p: This unit focuses on Stages 2 and 4.
